name: kitchen-second-floor
description:
You're in the second floor kitchen.
There's a space where once a coffee machine sat, and a whiteboard with evidence of the usual random office banter but not much else here to tempt you to hang around upstairs now.

inventory.name: space
inventory.detailedDescription: You'll need to head to the downstairs kitchen if you want coffee now.

attributes.defaultResult: The coffee machine is in the ground floor kitchen now.

inventory.detailedDescription: This one's generally a good source of amusement for the teams upstairs.

inventory.name: cloth
inventory.detailedDescription: It's slightly damp but should clean things up.

attributes.smell: It has that nasty smell of damp, old food and detergent.
